name: Spacejacked
description:
Spacejacked is a super fast-paced ARCADE TOWER-DEFENSE. Play as Dave, a lone technician tasked with protecting his spaceship from being overrun by aliens while it prepares to warp into hyperspace.

Players who seek to experience a blend of action shooter and tower defense will enjoy this game!

Features:
 * Shoot and build turrets!
 * Defend both the ground and ceiling! No spot is safe from aliens!
 * Story Mode filled with quirky characters over the course of 2 major story acts.
 * Challenge Mode with demanding set-pieces only fit for the most hardcore.
 * Two Endless Modes for even crazier action and compete for high-score with your friends.
intro: Build. Shoot. Survive invasion by aliens.
